nodes.text: The Norat were a group ruled by the Norat Sovereignty. Crandor Ijjix was a Norat. The Norat were destroyed by the Yevetha.

The Norat feature in the novel Shield of Lies. The Star Wars Encyclopedia and The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia also mention the group. None of these sources reveals whether the Norat are a sentient species or some other type of group.
